summary: The federal government has spent billions on information technology projects that have failed or performed poorly. Some agencies have had massive cybersecurity failures. These IT efforts often suffered from ineffective management. We testified about 2 issues on our High Risk List : management of IT acquisitions and operations, and cybersecurity. Since 2010, agencies have implemented 60% of our 1,277 recommendations on IT acquisitions and operations...
title: Information Technology: Implementation of GAO Recommendations Would Strengthen Federal Agencies' Acquisitions, Operations, and Cybersecurity Efforts
